en-US.summary: A quick, kind compliment whenever you ask.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Daily Compliment to give me a compliment
en-US.name: Daily Compliment
en-US.description: Daily Compliment gives you a friendly, family‑safe compliment on demand, powered by OpenAI.
